page-description: Your friendly companion having neurospicy (ADHD/Autism) brains in mind.
index.hero.subtitle: having Neurospicy Brains in mind
index.hero.features.helps-you-create-sma: helps you create small doable tasks
index.morning-routine.title: Morning Routine
index.morning-routine.teaser: Start the day with a warm good morning by Fibi. Plan the day with Fibi, go through appointments, block time for tasks, ‚Ä¶
index.morning-routine.walk-through-your-: Walk through your planned routine (Breakfast ‚úÖ, Shower ‚úÖ, ‚Ä¶)
index.morning-routine.start-the-day-with: Start the day with a well-prepared structure
index.morning-routine.quote.roland-text: I like to get an overview of the day in the morning and plan my to-dos.
index.taskCalendarSync.title: Task & Calendar Sync
index.taskCalendarSync.teaser: Highlights special appointments and helps preparation. Keep using your favorite app, e.g., Trello, Wonderlist, Deck - Fibi integrates them.
index.taskCalendarSync.get-answers-to-wh: Get answers to: "When is my next doctor appointment"
index.taskCalendarSync.split-big-tasks-w: Split big tasks with help by fibi
index.taskCalendarSync.quote.roland-text: I often got "surprised" by doctor appointents and other less regular events
index.positive-nudges.title: Positive Nudges
index.positive-nudges.teaser: Trouble with starting tasks? Have you tried task lists, bullet journals, apps, cards, ...?
index.positive-nudges.gives-ideas-how-to: Gives ideas how to start small
index.positive-nudges.knows-your-calenda: Knows your calendar and when there is time
index.positive-nudges.quote.roland-text: I tried a lot of tools to organize my days but lost focus quickly.
index.friendly-reminders.title: Friendly Reminders
index.friendly-reminders.teaser-first-li: Do you have to handle a bunch of stuff and feel lost?
index.friendly-reminders.tell-fibi-to-re: Tell Fibi to remind you about tasks/events after picking up your children
index.friendly-reminders.set-reminders-f: Set reminders for any doctor appointment:
index.friendly-reminders.remind-me-about: "Remind me about doctor events 2 day in advance."
index.friendly-reminders.quote.roland-te: I missed a lot of deadlines, did not particpate in events with my children and had trouble keeping track of things.
index.early-access.title: Ready for less overwhelm?
index.early-access.teaser: Fibi is searching for active feedback. You can be part of the Beta. Requirements:
index.early-access.fibi-uses-just-signal: Fibi uses just signal messenger right now
index.early-access.you-are-willing-to-gi: You are willing to give me feedback on your experience with Fibi
index.early-access.you-are-willing-to-ac: You are willing to actively use Fibi
index.early-access.further-information: Want to know more on Fibi's and their creatores background?
index.contact.title: Contact
index.secure-contact.title: Secure Contact
index.secure-contact.teaser: Email communication is not secure by design, thus, if you want to send a real secure mail, you can use my Public PGP Key. PGP encryption ensures, that just I can read the mail.
index.background.title: Background on Fibi and their creators
index.background.tab.who-am-i-why-fibi.t: Hello, I‚Äôm Roland‚Äîa software developer with autism and ADHD who‚Äôs always struggled to stay organized. I dreamed of a personal helper who could nudge me gently, remind me of tasks, and keep everything in one place. Once large language models emerged, it finally felt possible to bring ‚ÄúFibi‚Äù to life!
index.background.tab.ongoing-journey-of-: The ongoing journey of Fibi Fibi already supports tasks, calendar syncing (CalDAV/ICS), reminders, timers, and even a morning routine feature. But there‚Äôs more I‚Äôd love to improve. I‚Äôm currently running a smaller language model locally for privacy, and new hardware would help me scale while keeping your data secure and private. That‚Äôs why I‚Äôm seeking funding‚Äîto build a more robust system and add the advanced features our community needs, all without handing any personal data to third parties.
legal-notice.title: Legal notice
legal-notice.contact.title: Contact
index.footnote.these-are-features-id-lov: * These are features I'd love to implement, but that are complex and need funding.
general.avatar.fibi: Picture representing Fibi as a cute animal
general.avatar.sloth: A cute little sloth as a placeholder for your picture
contact-form.privacy-notice: Don't send personal information using the form. The data is processed by
contact-form.message-label: What can we help you with?
contact-form.accept-processed-by-label: I accept that my data is processed by
contact-form.start-conversation-template:
Hi Fibi-Team,

I am interested in using Fibi.
My name is: ##Your Name##
Fibi can support me to ##Why do you want to use Fibi?##

Kind regards
contact-form.join-beta-template:
Hi Fibi-Team,

I am interested in joining the beta.
My name is: ##Your Name##
Fibi can support me to ##Why do you want to use Fibi?##
I am willing to give feedback to improve Fibi.

Kind regards
card.friendly-reminders.title: Friendly Reminders
card.friendly-reminders.text: Fibi: ‚ÄúAre there any follow-up tasks for your last appointment?‚Äù
chat-example.title: Chat Example
chat-example.friendly-reminders.1-you: Remind me to add tasks and appointments after I pick up Jane from Kindergarten.
chat-example.friendly-reminders.3-fibi: I added the reminder for Jane's pickup appointmentments
chat-example.friendly-reminders.5-you: You just picked up Jane from kindergarten. Are there any new tasks or appointments?
card.morning-routine.title: Morning Routine
card.morning-routine.text: Wake up gently with a quick daily overview
chat-example.morning-routine.1-fibi: Good morning! üåÖ Welcome to another sunny day. How are you feeling?
chat-example.morning-routine.2-fibi: Let's start the morning routine gently.
chat-example.morning-routine.3-you: Good morning! Do I have any important meetings?
card.photograph-notices.title: Photograph notices
card.photograph-notices.text: Extracts tasks and appointments from notices by school, kindergarten etc.
card.positive-nudges.title: Positive Nudges
card.positive-nudges.text: Get small encouragements to reduce overwhelm
chat-example.positive-nudges.1-fibi: It's been a while since your last yoga session. How about a time slot for tomorrow?
chat-example.positive-nudges.2-you: That sounds great. I just had a lot to do lately and forgot about it
chat-example.positive-nudges.4-fibi: Don't worry! That'll be a great new start tomorrow. I just reserved a free time slot.
card.privacy.title: Privacy In Mind
card.privacy.text: No data is sent to third parties
card.other-routines.title: Other Routines
card.other-routines.text: Build new routines and get nudged
card.scan-emails.title: Scan Emails for to-dos
card.scan-emails.text: Extract tasks and appointments from your mails
card.task-calendar-sync.title: Task & Calendar Sync
card.task-calendar-sync.text: Keep track of everything in one place
chat-example.task-calendar-sync.1-fibi: Kai's birthday is upcoming. Is there something we could prepare for it?
chat-example.task-calendar-sync.4-fibi: Should I add a task for this and block some time? Do you need help choosing a gift?
